review: This is possibly the best thing ever invented. The only way it is hard to set up is if you can't read. Wait, scratch that, the directions on the inside of the box (there are three steps) are written out in pictures. This thing is amazing. What I love the most is that it is super portable. I've used it for everything from the usuall stuff like TV shows, streaming YouTube and Comcast to some other stuff like a projector replacesment - I just cast my powerpoints from my smartphone!Buy this. Buy one for every TV you have. Do it now.
author: Del Belcher
